function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Close proximity of towels hangers and lockers increases the risk of contagious disease transmission among members.","Impact":"Increased likelihood of disease transmission and spread within the gym environment.","Mitigation":"Reconfigure the layout to increase distance between towels hangers and implement individual lockers for members' accessories.","Technologies":"None specified.","People":"Gym members and staff.","Owner":"Gym management and facility designers."},{"Description":"Lack of clear markings and separation of warm-up areas and running lanes increases the potential for members to interact closely, leading to an increased risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission and potential spread among members during exercise activities.","Mitigation":"Implement clear markings and instructions to limit interaction between individuals in warm-up areas and running lanes.","Technologies":"None specified.","People":"Gym members and staff.","Owner":"Gym management and fitness instructors."},{"Description":"Insufficient cleaning and sterilization of equipment and machines increases the risk of disease transmission among gym members.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease transmission due to contaminated fitness equipment.","Mitigation":"Implement hourly complete sterilizing sessions and ensure janitors adhere to rotary activities for equipment sterilization.","Technologies":"Sterilization equipment and cleaning products.","People":"Gym members and janitorial staff.","Owner":"Gym management and janitorial department."}]}
